p: In some studies Astrodaucu spersicus was tested foranti-cancerproperties. Abdolmohammadi et al. determined the antiproliferative effects of A . persicus extracts in comparison to doxorubicin on T47D cells by yellow tetrazolium salt (3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide or MTT method ( Abdolmohammadi et al., 2008). The purpose of this paper was to investigate whether it is possible to find anti-cancer molecules from Astrodaucus genus based on the available findings.
